id.title: Mod ID
id.description: Unique ID used my BeatMods2 and other mods to identify this mod

version.title: Mod Version
version.description: Version according to the semantic versioning specification

gameVersion.title: Game Version
gameVersion.description: Beat Saber version this mod was designed for

license.title: Mod License
license.description: SPDX license expression (or "FILE licensefilehere" if not a valid SPDX license)

dependsOn.title: Dependencies
dependsOn.description: Other mods this mod depends on mapped by ID

^([A-Z][0-9a-z]*)+(\\.([A-Z][0-9a-z]*)+).description: Version range according to the semantic versioning specification

conflictsWith.title: Incompatibilities
conflictsWith.description: Other mods this mod conflicts with mapped by ID

^([A-Z][0-9a-z]*)+(\\.([A-Z][0-9a-z]*)+).description: Version range according to the semantic versioning specification

loadAfter.description: Mods to load before this one

loadBefore.description: Mods to load after this one

features.title: Mod Features
features.description: Features to enable for this mod

icon.title: Mod Icon
icon.description: Path to a PNG icon for this mod

project-home.title: Home
project-home.description: Link to the mod homepage (same as project-source if not specified)

project-source.title: Source
project-source.desccription: Link to the mod source (same as project-home if not specified)

publish.title: Publishing Settings
publish.description: Settings to use when publishing this mod using bm2

script.title: Publishing Script
script.description: Commands to run before publishing (cwd will be the manifest directory) (will run even if resource is not specified)

resource.title: Resource
resource.description: Path to the resource to upload to BeatMods2 (if it is a file, will be uploaded directly; if it is a folder, zipped contents will be uploaded)

readme.title: Readme
readme.description: Path to a markdown readme to display on BeatMods2 (same as description if not specified)
